bestBHT.bht: As the appointed time approached, Elizabeth's nine-month journey of carrying a child was now complete. True to the predictions of the angel to both Zacharias and Mary, she joyfully brought forth a son, a testament to the fulfillment of God's plan. This significant moment showcased the faithfulness of God and marked the beginning of a new chapter in the redemption story. Elizabeth's faithful obedience and the miraculous birth of her son were powerful reminders of God's providence and purpose.

Philip Schaff: Luke 1:57. Fulfilled. Evidently after Mary’s departure.
John Gill: The nine months, which is the full time of a woman's going with child, were now complete.
She brought forth a son, according to the angel's prediction both to Zacharias and Mary.
Now Elisabeth's full time came...and she brought forth a son.

bhtAttempts.bht: After nine months, the time had come for Elizabeth to give birth to the long-awaited son, just as the angel had predicted to both Zacharias and Mary. It was a moment of fulfillment, marking the completion of Elizabeth's pregnancy. With joy and anticipation, she brought forth a son, a miraculous child whose arrival would set into motion the divine plan for the redemption of all humanity.

Now, as the nine months reached their full term, the appointed time had arrived for Elizabeth to give birth to her son, exactly as foretold by the angel to both Zacharias and Mary. It was the culmination of a miraculous journey, as she brought forth a son into the world, a testament to the faithfulness and providence of God. This moment showcased the divine fulfillment of their prophetic words and set into motion the unfolding of God's plan for the redemption of mankind.

After the completion of the full term, Elizabeth's hour of deliverance had arrived, just as the angel had predicted to Zacharias and Mary. With great joy and gratitude, Elizabeth brought forth a son into the world, a fulfillment of God's divine plan. This long-awaited moment signified the end of a meaningful journey and the beginning of a life that would play a vital role in the redemption of humanity. The birth of this miraculous child was a testament to the faithfulness and divine intervention of God.

As the appointed time approached, Elizabeth's nine-month journey of carrying a child was now complete. True to the predictions of the angel to both Zacharias and Mary, she joyfully brought forth a son, a testament to the fulfillment of God's plan. This significant moment showcased the faithfulness of God and marked the beginning of a new chapter in the redemption story. Elizabeth's faithful obedience and the miraculous birth of her son were powerful reminders of God's providence and purpose.

After an entire nine months had elapsed, Elizabeth's time of maternity was finally complete. Just as the angel had foretold to both Zacharias and Mary, she joyfully gave birth to a son. This fulfillment demonstrated the trustworthiness of God's declarations and marked the beginning of a remarkable journey. Elizabeth's obedience and the miraculous birth of her son were emblematic of divine guidance, shining a light on God's providential involvement in the unfolding redemption narrative.
